author: stefan2
msg: Make find_repos() fit to be used in a repository pool, i.e. without
add members sasl params stored in the svnserve.cfg
(cyrus_auth_request): take the sasl params from the repository_t struct
(find_repos): replace server baton with individual parameters;
pass cfg in as optional parameter;
read SASL settings from config file as well;
(serve): update caller; do "no access" test here

author: stefan2
msg: Instead of evaluating the repos-global access settings from svnserve.conf
again and again, read it once and store the result in the respository_t.
(repository_t): add members for repo-global access settings
must_have_access): update / simplify using the new struct members
(cyrus_auth_request): update / simplify using the new struct members

author: crossley
msg: Fix error with metadata entry. Please see http://incubator.apache.org/guides/mentor.html#Overview
